snippet.title: Rogue Trooper trailer
snippet.description:
http://j.mp/GOG_RTrooper

Rogue Trooper is a futuristic tactical action game, based on the 2000 AD comic of the same name. Nu Earth is a hostile, polluted planet that is being torn apart by an endless war between the Norts and Southers. Rogue is a genetic infantryman (G.I.), one of an elite squad of biologically-engineered clone troops, created as the Southers' secret weapon. During his very first mission, Rogue witnesses the betrayal and massacre of his entire squad. As the sole survivor, he goes AWOL, determined to hunt down the traitor who sent his brothers-in-arms to their deaths.
